title: Russia Downs 20 Drones Over Crimea Following a Spate of Attacks on Moscow
description: Fourteen drones were shot down by Russian air defenses and a further six were jammed electronically.

title: A Cherished Weekend Flea Market in the Ukrainian Capital Survives Despite War
description: Despite buyers having to tighten their belts, the market still offers a large and eclectic variety of goods.

title: Damar Hamlin to Take Next Step in Comeback Bid in Bills’ Preseason Game Against Colts
description: The Bills have eased Hamlin back on the field, starting with him taking part in individual drills in May.

title: The Good Israel Will Prevail
description: For 32 weeks Israel has been riven by protests over controversial judicial reforms. A former Israeli general on why the right side must win
